Â Â Â Â Â Â - run: echo "ğŸ‰ The job was automatically triggered by a

Â Â Â Â Â Â - run: echo "ğŸ§ This job is now running on a ${{ runner.Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â os }} 
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â server hosted by GitHub!"

Â Â Â Â Â Â - name: Check out repository code

Â Â Â Â Â Â - run: echo "ğŸ–¥ The workflow is now ready to test your Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â code on the runner."
Â Â Â Â Â Â - name: List files in the repository

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ls ${{ GitHub.workspace }}
Â Â Â Â Â Â - run: echo "ğŸ This job's status is ${{ job.status }}."

Â Â Â name: Lint

Â Â Â Â Â - name: Set up Go

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â with:
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â go-version: 1.18
Â Â Â Â Â - name: Check out code
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â uses: actions/checkout@v1

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â curl -sSfL

 build:

```go
# 1\. Compile the app.
FROM golang:1.18Â Â as builder
WORKDIR /app
COPY . .
RUN CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux go build -a -o bin/embed
# 2\. Create final environment for the compiled binary.
FROM alpine:latest
RUN apk --update upgrade && apk --no-cache add curl ca-certificates && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*
RUN mkdir -p /app
# 3\. Copy the binary from step 1 and set it as the default command.
COPY --from=builder /app/bin/embed /app
WORKDIR /app
CMD /app/embed
```

```go
name: Build Docker Image
on:
 push:
Â Â Â branches:
Â Â Â Â Â - main
 pull_request:
env:
 REGISTRY: ghcr.io
 IMAGE_NAME: ${{ GitHub.repository }}
jobs:
 push_to_GitHub_registry:
Â Â Â name: Push Docker image to Docker Hub
Â Â Â runs-on: ubuntu-latest
Â Â Â steps:
Â Â Â Â Â ...
Â Â Â Â Â - name: Log in to the Container registry
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â uses: docker/login-action@v2
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â with:
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â registry: ${{ env.REGISTRY }}
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â username: ${{ GitHub.actor }}
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â password: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
Â Â Â Â Â - name: Build and push Docker image
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â uses: docker/build-push-action@v3
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â with:
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â context: .
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â file: ./Dockerfile
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â push: true
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â tags: ${{ env.REGISTRY }}/${{ env.IMAGE_NAME 
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â }}/chapter12:latest
```
